title: Natural Language Understanding for User-Friendly Interaction
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to understand my varied speech patterns and accents so that I can interact easily without feeling frustrated or monitored.

summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to learn my preferences over time so that it can provide personalized support without making me feel monitored.
